thread.title: JAMES HOOD
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by JAMES HOOD

author: JAMES HOOD
title: JAMES HOOD
text:
My experience dealing with Ms. Bobby Hennig was one of surprise (finally go through the SS telephone maze) and very pleasant. Bobby was very patient with me, very knowledgeable and seemed to be highly concerned that I could access SS's services due to a DMV shut down of services in Colorado. For here forth should I require SS assistance I will call Bobbie Hennig.
SS should consider simplifying the telephone service you provide. It is maddening to access a human being with which to discuss problems.
